channel.title: Combining a client and cache into one download!
channel.description: Hey everyone, I am running DSPK source, and I love it. The only thing bad about this is that you have to download the cache and the client. :( I know there is a way to compress the files so that you only have to download the client and the cache will automatically download and extract to C:/ drive. Or you can change the client path to just find the cache in a different place..

item.title: Combining a client and cache into one download!
item.dc:creator: @xdstyle007 xdstyle007
item.description:
@xdstyle007 wrote:

Look for a pi webclient tutorial and do the part where it sets cache downloader. You need CacheDownloader.java

Read full topic
item.source: Combining a client and cache into one download!
